name: evershop
description: Evershop is a headless e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. It provides an admin panel, storefront, and APIs for building customized online stores that can be self-hosted or extended as needed.

features.title: Headless Commerce
features.description: Flexible e-commerce with modern architecture. Build custom storefronts

features.title: Admin Panel
features.description: Manage products, orders, and customers easily. Complete store control

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful APIs for any frontend. Universal integration

features.title: Storefront Included
features.description: Ready-to-use shop interface. Start selling quickly

features.title: Extensible Platform
features.description: Customize and extend as needed. Grow with your business

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your e-commerce platform completely. No transaction fees ever
